alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:22AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hampshire, northwestern Franklin and western Hampden Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Russell, or near Westfield, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of heavy rainfall are forecast to continue this morning and afternoon. If prolonged heavy rainfall rates continue to occur over these areas, a flash flood warning may be issued. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Greenfield, Deerfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Monroe, Southwick, Montague, Southampton, Hadley, Sunderland, Hatfield and Williamsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
